input.sentences: i traveled to the city and looked at the water .
everyone stood outside and observed it .
there were many buildings to see .
we stayed at a beautiful motel when it stated to get dark .
output.sentences: The cityscape from the water was quiet.
The lights of the building shone on the pedestrians on the street in front.
A long building had a small crowd gathered infront of it.
A facade of a building was a shadow of the building that it once was.
Late at night the lights shone even brighter.
